Integrate Supabase backend for Airport Task Management Application

Major updates:
- Replace localStorage with Supabase PostgreSQL database
- Add real-time synchronization across multiple users
- Create complete project structure with Vite + React + TypeScript
- Implement full CRUD operations with Supabase client
- Add database schema with tables for tasks, remarks, team members, and equipment
- Configure Row Level Security policies
- Add real-time subscriptions for live updates
- Update component with TypeScript types and async operations
- Add loading states and error handling
- Remove "BANANA" test button, replace with proper Print button
- Create comprehensive README and SETUP documentation
- Add .gitignore to exclude credentials and build artifacts

Features:
- Tasks with categories, priorities, statuses, and recurring schedules
- Team member and equipment management
- Task remarks/comments system
- Advanced filtering and views
- Print-friendly reports
- Real-time multi-user collaboration

Tech Stack:
- React 18 + TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Supabase (PostgreSQL + Real-time)
- Vite
